item.title: Flytipping of construction waste, 3rd July
item.description:
Builders use Mayfair Close as the illegal fly tipping dump. They dump their construction waste, obviously from work on some brick house with the garden (paving stones). This cannot be from residents of apartment block, as noone has gardens, only flats. This block has been targeted for several months, since the new regulations. This flytipping rubbish needs to be removed as it's a health risk with little children living in the nearby block.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayfair Close, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal A-board sign on footway outside Squeeze 130a Kingsland High St, London E8 2LQ, 3rd July
item.description:
Illegal A-board sign on footway outside Squeeze, 130a Kingland High Street, E8 2LQ. This is a hazard for blind and visually impaired pedestrians. Given that it's a licensed premises and it is this an unlawful activity, please inform the Licensing Officer.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple fly tips by 4 Middleton Road, 3rd July

item.title: Public bin bags emptied and bags left, 3rd July
item.description:
Once again the the public bins have been emptied and bags full of cat litter and feces have been left at the back of our house. Please talk to the bin men and get them to stop doing it

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clevedon Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The resident in our Almshouse that borders Consort Road and Manaton CLose is reporting a terrible smell from the bins located in the adjacent car park. The smell is so bad he cannot sit in his garden and he deems it a health hazard., 3rd July
item.description:
As above. Please arrange for the bins to be emptied and cleaned. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manaton Close, Nunhead, London

item.title: Foul cooking odour, 3rd July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
